tile module

class tile.Tile(pos, groups, sprite_type, surface=<Surface(32x32x32 SW)>)

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

Replaces a sprite tile in the game and draws it on the screen

Parameters

  • pos (int) – position on the surface in n * settings.TILESIZE

  • groups (pygame.sprite.Group) – sprite group of the tile

  • sprite_type (String) – type of the sprite (legacy)

  • surface (pygame.Surface, optional) – surface on which the sprite should be drawn, defaults to pygame.Surface((TILESIZE,TILESIZE))
